query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.status=1 and est.sendtime>=to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operateuserid in ('@revUserid@')and est.operateuserid is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.endtime,est.operateuserid from est_circuitdispatch where status=1 and est.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operateuserid='@s1@'

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.status=1 and est.operatetype=113 and linkExcuteResult='101090303' and linkFailedReason='101090501' and est.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operateuserid in (@revUserid@)
